p: Whole blood and punch biopsy samples were collected from 23 HVs, 9 participants with DLE (1 participant did not consent to a whole blood sample and 1 participant did not consent to a punch biopsy sample) and 1 participant with SCLE. Skin tape samples and punch biopsies were collected from participants with CLE-affected skin (CLE-A) and from HVs; only skin tape samples were collected from CLE-unaffected skin (CLE-U). Further details are in online supplementary materials.
